nodes.text: The Belsallian Sea was a body of water located on the planet Serenno in the Serenno system of the Outer Rim Territories. The planetary capital during the reign of the Galactic Empire, Carannia, was located upon its shore.
The Belsallian Sea contained Otoh Dooku and the Demurra Trench.

The Belsallian sea was first mentioned and shown in the comic Star Wars: Agent of the Empire during the Hard Targets arc's first issue; written by John Ostrander and illustrated by Davide Fabbri, which was published in 2012. The edge of the sea was pictured briefly during a fight between the series protagonist Jahan Cross and bounty hunter Boba Fett taking place in Carannia.
